text: I ordered a half size too big because I'd rather have them loose then tight. Thr strap on top that goes between the toes is really tight and I have slender feet. I really had to work my feet in. My hope is that it loosens over time as the flip flops are broken in. The cushion is thinner then I thought it would be. Though it is comfortable right now, I don't expect it'll stay that way for long. But that doesn't mean it's a bad shoe. It'll just be worn down to be flat and hard like any other shoe instead of staying cushiony. The bottom of the shoe is also thin and made of a light foam. I thought it was going to be a heavier duty rubber. It's not a bad shoe but its not blowing me away either. For not much more I can go get a nice pair at the department store of much better quality. I'm disappointed but its not a bad shoe. Just mediocre and not really worth the price in my opinion. Will be returning.

text: The overall product is just all right. Very cheaply made, but I bought it to wear around the house (inside), so I’m hoping it’ll last longer.  The smell was absolutely horrible. I will need to air these out for a few days, and may even give them a gentle wash, to kill the smell. Even my german shepherd, who loves to steal slippers and shoes, did not want anything to do with these…one sniff and he was GONE! Not impressed with these flip flops as much as I thought it would be.

text: I wear cushioned flip flops indoors at home year round, this is my first time trying this brand. I normally have either Nike's or Underarmor, both of which last at least a good 6-12 months for me, but I purchased these on August 31 and today, October 19 it's already ripped and unable to be worn.  I noticed a few weeks ago the strap that goes between the toes on the right flip flop was loosened and half ripped, but still wearable, but today the left one completely ripped.  Very unhappy with this product!

text: I bought these because of the "supposed" memory foam. I have bone spurs and chronic tendonitis and needed something in a sandal that has memory foam. That's the whole reason I bought these. What they show in the picture is a complete misrepresentation! There is BARELY memory foam. I received them today and put them on and immediately my foot sunk down to the flat bottom of the sandal. If you are looking for something to comfort some kind of foot ailment, do not waste your money on these! I sure wish I hadn't! They are rock hard and extremely uncomfortable!!
title: SO disappointed!
